### Original Issue Description:
test-conda-python-3.9-spark-master failing commit [d89c0b4](https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/d89c0b4aadecd09dbeb8051688f347c9d0af89ad)

  `[~LuciferYang]`  Is this something you can comment on? Thanks very much.
